name: Get_Languages
response_summary: The API response lists three available language options for users. The first option is English (UK), represented by the country code "en-gb" and the flag of the United Kingdom. The second option is English (US), indicated by the code "en-us" and the flag of the United States. Lastly, there is Deutsch (German), which uses the code "de" and is associated with the flag of Germany. These options allow users to select their preferred language and regional variation.
enhance_func_desc: This API is designed for language selection in applications. It retrieves available language options with their respective country codes and flags, enabling users to choose their preferred language and regional variation. The response includes details like language codes (e.g., "en-gb" for English UK) and associated flags, supporting multilingual interfaces. No input parameters are required.

name.description: The display name of the language and its regional variation (e.g., 'English (UK)').

code.description: The language code, which may include regional identifiers (e.g., 'en-gb' for English (UK)).

countryFlag.description: The country code representing the flag associated with the language (e.g., 'gb' for the United Kingdom).
